metadata.inclusion:
1. Open the August app
2. Go to the Lock Settings screen
3. Select 'Z-Wave Settings'
4. Select 'Add To A Z-Wave Network'
5. Select 'My Hub is in Inclusion Mode' on the August app
metadata.exclusion:
1. Open the August app
2. Go to the Lock Settings screen
3. Select 'Z-Wave Settings'
4. Select 'Remove Z-Wave Device'
5. Select 'My Hub is in Exclusion Mode' on the August app
metadata.reset:
1. Open the August app
2. Go to the Lock Settings screen
3. Select 'Z-Wave Settings'
4. Select 'Remove Z-Wave device'
5. Select 'My Hub Is No Longer Working'
6. Select 'Reset Z-Wave Device'
7. On the 'Reset Z-Wave Device?' prompt select Reset

comments.text: This lock randomly stops reacting to Z-Wave commands, becoming unusable. No fixes are available at this time.
